userId.description: the id of the user that this timer belongs to

description.description: extra input for more in-depth description of timer, handles links

creationTime.description: moment in ms that the timer was created, valid for the next 1000 years

creationOffset.description: utcOffset stored from user's creationTime creation, in minutes

endTime.description: moment in ms from start until timer finish

expired.description: whether or not this timer has expired

surprise.description: array of the date properties that should be surprising
